p: Among the HFMD positive cases confirmed in laboratory during 2010–2016, there were 10244 males and 6588 females, with an average annual male to female ratio of 1.55:1. The proportion of pathogens in the gender was shown in Table 1, there was no significant difference in the pathogen proportion of different gender (χ 2 = 0.133, P > 0.05). HFMD positive cases mainly concentrated in children aged 1 to 3 years old, accounting for 73.12%, of which the proportion of 1- year-old group was the highest (31.99%). There was significant difference in the proportion of pathogens in different age groups(χ 2 = 231.765, P <0.001).
